carousel.njk

Import code

{% from "components/carousel.njk" import carousel %}

Arguments

{{ carousel(
    props={
        figures: [
            {
                image: "/assets/uploads/" | iframe: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/",
                unstyled: boolean,
                alt: "",
                lazy: boolean,
                caption: "",
                focus: "object-",
                aspect: "aspect-"
            }
        ],
        indicators: true
    },
    attrs={
        "aria-label": "",
    }
) }}

Implementation notes

  • Expects props.figures to be an array of objects that match the properties of the figure component.
  • props.indicators shows or hides the indicator dots.
